testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDeviceInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.13 [Need to Share Section Status] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Section Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.8.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N98R1051_Restrictions___Section_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N98R1051_Restrictions___Section_Status_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Section Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.8.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N98R1052_Section_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N98R1052_Section_Name_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Description of Timing Pattern - Section Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.8.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N98R1053_Description_of_Timing_Pattern___Section_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N98R1053_Description_of_Timing_Pattern___Section_Status_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cycle Length - Section Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.8.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N98R1054_Cycle_Length___Section_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N98R1054_Cycle_Length___Section_Status_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier - Section Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.8.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N98R1055_Operator_Identifier___Section_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N98R1055_Operator_Identifier___Section_Status_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier - Section Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.8.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N98R1056_Event_Identifier___Section_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N98R1056_Event_Identifier___Section_Status_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan - Section Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.8.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N98R1057_Event_Response_Plan___Section_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N98R1057_Event_Response_Plan___Section_Status_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Section Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.8.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N98R1058_Section_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N98R1058_Section_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 19 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 20 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 20.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionStatusUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N98R1046_Publish_Section_Status_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 20.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.1 VERIFY that element sectionStatusMsg exists.
Step 20.1.2.2 VERIFY that element organization-information exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.3 VERIFY that element section-id exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.4 VERIFY that element node-id-list exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.5 VERIFY that element section-control-mode exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.6 VERIFY that element timing-pattern-id exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.7 IF TMDD_N98R1051_Restrictions___Section_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.7.1 VERIFY that element restrictions exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.8 IF TMDD_N98R1052_Section_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.8.1 VERIFY that element section-name exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N98R1053_Description_of_Timing_Pattern___Section_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that element timing-pattern-name exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N98R1054_Cycle_Length___Section_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that element cycle-time exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N98R1055_Operator_Identifier___Section_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that element operator-id exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N98R1056_Event_Identifier___Section_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that element event-id exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N98R1057_Event_Response_Plan___Section_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N98R1058_Section_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that element last-comm-time exists within each instance of sectionStatusMsg.section-status-item
Step 20.1.2.15 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 20.1.2.16 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True

Step 20.1.2.17 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionStatusUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N98R1046_Publish_Section_Status_Information_Parameter OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage
